svg.text: Generally speaking, it is many years later that people appreciate their education., For example, people who can read might have found it boring to learn this skill when they were children. Also, we cannot be sure of the future benefits of studying certains subjects. In my case, I regretted not having studied some natural science in high school after I realised that I would have to study statistics and mathematics ar university. Therefore, it is often later in life that the importance of a good education is realised.
